item.title: The importance of Video Call Recording for online customer support
item.description: Source: Interactive Powers Why getting video recordings is key for a successful video contact center? Benefits, Implementation Considerations, and Recommendations Currently, many companies are looking for implementing a video contact center as a way to improve the customer experience. However, not all of these companies are fully taking advantage of the potential of this tool. One of the most important features to consider when implementing a video contact center is the ability to record customer interactions on video.
